sentences.en: "There's no threat in this, Freddie," Arnold hastened to say.
sentences.cn: “这不会有什么危险的，弗雷迪，”阿诺德急忙补充了一句。

sentences.en: A constant threat of unemployment hangs over thousands of university researchers.
sentences.cn: 持续存在的失业威胁困扰着数千名大学科研人员。

sentences.en: He is constantly on guard against any threat of humiliation.
sentences.cn: 他时刻提防着任何有辱尊严之事。

sentences.en: I think your concern is misplaced. Ackroyd is no threat to anyone.
sentences.cn: 我认为你多虑了，阿克罗伊德不会对任何人构成威胁。

sentences.en: It was more of an idle threat than anything.
sentences.cn: 那其实是唬人的话。

sentences.en: Many women achievers appear to pose a threat to their male colleagues.
sentences.cn: 许多事业有成的女性似乎对她们的男同事构成了一种威胁。

sentences.en: Nichols never carried out his threat to resign.
sentences.cn: 尼科尔斯威胁过要辞职，但从未付诸行动。

sentences.en: Officials at the school say they received a bomb threat at approximately 11:30 a.m. today.
sentences.cn: 学校的官员说他们在今天上午11点半左右收到过炸弹恐吓。

sentences.en: Pack ice around Iceland was becoming a threat to navigation.
sentences.cn: 冰岛周围的浮冰群曾一度对船只航行构成威胁。

sentences.en: Rebel sources have so far reacted cautiously to the threat.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，反叛分子面对威胁的反应非常谨慎。

sentences.en: She dismissed the statement as an empty threat .
sentences.cn: 她无视这项声明，认为是个空口威胁。

sentences.en: Soviet expansionism was considered a real threat.
sentences.cn: 苏联的扩张主义被认为是真正的威胁。

sentences.en: Sudan even threat-ened to mobilize in response to the ultima-tums.
sentences.cn: 作为对最后通牒的回应，苏丹甚至威胁说要动员军队。

sentences.en: Supplies are under increasing threat from overuse and pollution.
sentences.cn: 由于滥用和污染，供应正受到日益严重的威胁。

sentences.en: The government will not give in to terrorist threats .
sentences.cn: 政府不会屈服于恐怖分子的威胁。

sentences.en: The police are investigating death threats made against the two men.
sentences.cn: 警方正在调查针对这两名男子的死亡恐吓。

sentences.en: The threat of inflation is already evident in bond prices.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀的危险在证券价格上已经表现得很明显。

sentences.en: The threat will force greater dispersion of their forces.
sentences.cn: 恫吓将迫使他们把兵力铺得更广。

sentences.en: They feel under permanent threat.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得一直处于威胁之下。

sentences.en: They warned him with veiled threats not to mention anything he had witnessed.
sentences.cn: 他们话中有话地威胁他不要提及他所目睹的事。

sentences.en: threats made against his wife and children
sentences.cn: 对他妻儿的威胁

sentences.en: Yesterday his kidnappers issued a second threat to kill him.
sentences.cn: 昨天绑匪再次威胁要将他撕票。

sentences.en: Your threats don’t scare me.
sentences.cn: 你的那些威胁吓不倒我。

phrases.tran_cn: 紧迫的威胁；逼近的威胁
构成威胁；形成一种威胁
保安巡逻，对安全的威胁；安全感胁

trans.tran_en: a statement in which you tell someone that you will cause them harm or trouble if they do not do what you want
